alluxio.master.file.async

Class DefaultAsyncPersistHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.master.file.async.DefaultAsyncPersistHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncPersistHandler

    public class DefaultAsyncPersistHandler
extends Object
implements AsyncPersistHandler
    The default handler for async persistence that schedules the persistence on the workers that contains all the blocks of a given file, and the handler returns the scheduled request whenever the corresponding worker polls.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface alluxio.master.file.async.AsyncPersistHandler

      • pollFilesToPersist

        public List<PersistFile> pollFilesToPersist(long workerId)
                                     throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                                            InvalidPathException,
                                            AccessControlException
        Polls the files to send to the given worker for persistence. It also removes files from the worker entry in mWorkerToAsyncPersistFiles.
        Specified by:
        pollFilesToPersist in interface AsyncPersistHandler
        Parameters:
        workerId - the worker id
        Returns:
        the list of files
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
